custom-sql.sql: SELECT survey_operation.title, survey_object.name, (CAST(CONVERT(DATE, survey_operation.start_date) AS VARCHAR) + ' - ' + CAST(CONVERT(DATE, survey_operation.end_date) AS VARCHAR)) AS periode, survey_operation.submitted_date FROM survey_operation AS survey_operation LEFT JOIN survey_object AS survey_object ON survey_operation.survey_object_id = survey_object.id
SELECT * FROM survey_operation WHERE end_date > GETDATE()
